records.location_details: Incident occurred between the Greek and Turkish maritime border near the island of Lesvos, specifically north of Lesvos. A rubber boat was later found adrift at different coordinates.
records.where_clear: North of Lesvos, Eastern Aegean Sea, near Greek-Turkish maritime border
records.location_text_raw: between the Greek and Turkish maritime border near the island of Lesvos; north of Lesvos (39° 26' 45''N - 026° 26' 21''E); 39°16′N 026°35′E
records.context_note: A Frontex Surveillance Aircraft observed a Greek patrol boat towing an empty rubber boat, then transferring approximately 20-30 migrants onto it, and later leaving the rubber boat adrift near the Greek-Turkish maritime border north of Lesvos. Greek authorities subsequently informed that the rubber boat landed safely on Turkish shores under the monitoring of a Turkish Coast Guard vessel.
records.evidence_quote: At 23:05 Frontex Surveillance Aircraft (FSA) spots a rubber boat with approx. 20-30 POB, stopped, and one Greek Patrol vessel is very close. ... At 02:46 Frontex Surveillance Aircraft takes a picture of a Greek patrol vessel towing the rubber boat with migrants on board towards TUR Territorial Waters with course 051°.
